chart_description: This chart shows the percentage of system CPU time used by the different user groups on the system, with 100% equaling 1 core.

dimension_descriptions.libvirt: The user group associated with the Libvirt virtualization software.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: The user group for the D-Bus message bus system.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The user group for the Netdata monitoring system.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: The user group for unprivileged user processes.
dimension_descriptions.root: The user group for the root user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: The user group for the systemd-coredump daemon.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: The user group associated with the XFS filesystem.
